overview: Milena and Marko are visiting Marko's father on a remote mountain. Both Marko and Milena have their own agendas for the vacation: Marko wants to convince father that he should sell the mountain house, while Milena wants to advance their relationship. The couple plays nice in front of the father, and Milena soon realizes Marko isn't the man she fell in love with.
title: Family Vacation
